nodes.text: Timon Medon, along with the Fey family, was the Pau'an credited with the unification of the planet Utapau. He was an ancestor of the Port Administrator of Pau City, Tion Medon.

Timon Medon was known as the Unifier of Utapau, and was the being responsible for bringing the scattered nation-states and communities of Pau'ans and Utai together, to live in peace in the sinkhole cities of Utapau. Timon drafted a constitution of beneficial principles between the two species, and forged treaties between the various cities. He became a revered and almost legendary figure on his homeworld.
A plaza in Pau City was named after him, located near the Utapau Council Chambers.
